      • createNewTrade

        Create a new trade between the current user, and the friend he is wanting to trade with

      • getUserOfferSelections

        public void getUserOfferSelections(java.util.UUID currentTradeID,
                          android.app.Activity parent,
                          int callingButton)
        Fetch the correct user's inventory to allow addition of new items to a trade
        Parameters:
        currentTradeID - current trade so correct users are looked at
        parent - calling activity to update the UI
        callingButton - allows differentiation between whether you are looking at your own, or another users inventory

      • changeOffer

        public void changeOffer(android.app.Activity parent,
               java.util.UUID tradeID,
               Book book,
               int offerToEdit,
               java.lang.Boolean addOffer)
        Allows for books to be added and removed from a trade offer
        Parameters:
        tradeID - ID for the trade currently being changed
        book - book to be added or removed from the trade
        offerToEdit - a check to see which user's offer will be changed
        addOffer - true to add a book, false to remove the book

      • setAcceptedStatus

        public void setAcceptedStatus(android.app.Activity parent,
                     java.lang.Boolean status,
                     java.util.UUID currentTradeID,
                     java.lang.Boolean setOtherUser)
        Set whether a user has accepted a given trade
        Parameters:
        status - true or false for whether the user has accepted
        currentTradeID - the unique ID for the trade being altered

      • getTradeList

        public void getTradeList(android.app.Activity parent,
                android.widget.ListView inProgressTradeView,
                android.widget.ListView completedTradeView)
        Get the list of trades relevant to the local user
        Parameters:
        parent - the calling activity
        inProgressTradeView - view which shows in progress trades
        completedTradeView - view which shows the completed trades

      • getCurrentTradeOffer

        public void getCurrentTradeOffer(android.app.Activity parent,
                        java.util.UUID currentTradeID,
                        android.widget.ListView yourItemsListView,
                        android.widget.ListView theirItemsListView)
        Gets the current offers for the trade being looked at
        Parameters:
        parent - the calling activity
        currentTradeID - the UUID for the trade being examined
        yourItemsListView - The view for the local user's trade offer
        theirItemsListView - the view for the other user's trade offer

      • deleteTrade

        public void deleteTrade(android.app.Activity parent,
               Trade trade)
        Removes a trade from the database and update the UI NOTE: This runs slowly because the server needs to update before the UI updates
        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to be removed from the database

      • setTradeComplete

        public void setTradeComplete(android.app.Activity parent,
                    java.util.UUID currentTradeID)
        Sets the selected trade to complete Removes the trade from the server, and replaces it with the updated one
        Parameters:
        currentTradeID - trade to be completed

      • checkIfAccepted

        public void checkIfAccepted(java.util.UUID currentTradeID,
                   ViewIndividualTradeActivity parent)
        Check if both users have accepted the trade, then prompts if the trade is complete or not
        Parameters:
        currentTradeID - UUID for the trade currently being looked at
        parent - the activity calling this method

      • startEmail

        Starts the send email async task
        Parameters:
        parent - activity which is calling this method
        tradeID - UUID for the trade being looked at
